text: A Song to Remember is a 1945 American biographical movie directed by Charles Vidor and starring Cornel Wilde, Paul Muni, Merle Oberon, Nina Foch, George Coulouris, Howard Freeman, Stephen Bekassy. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures and was nominated for six Academy Awards in 1946. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1945 movies Category:1940s biographical movies Category:American biographical movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Charles Vidor
title: A Song to Remember
